title: Wrong data set result returned when setting an invalid filter expression using row[0]
description: When setting the filter expression to "row[0] equals to 0", the data set returns an incorrect result or a null result set.
OB: When setting a filter in the data set with the expression "row[0] equals to", and then clicking on the Preview tab, the first result record is returned instead of the expected result.
EB: The developer has stated that the filter expression "row[0]" can only be generated after all the data has been fetched. Therefore, it should not be used as a filter expression.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Set a filter in the data set with the expression "row[0] equals to "
2. Click on the Preview tab.
